paragraphs.content: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth’s sake.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Not unto us, O Lord, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth’s sake.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is now their God?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is now their God?

paragraphs.content: But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.

paragraphs.content: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.

paragraphs.content: They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:

paragraphs.content: They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:

paragraphs.content: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.

paragraphs.content: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.

paragraphs.content: O Israel, trust thou in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Israel, trust thou in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.

paragraphs.content: O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O house of Aaron, trust in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.

paragraphs.content: Ye that fear the LORD, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye that fear the Lord, trust in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.

paragraphs.content: The LORD hath been mindful of us: he will bless us; he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord hath been mindful of us: he will bless us; he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.

paragraphs.content: He will bless them that fear the LORD, both small and great.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He will bless them that fear the Lord, both small and great.

paragraphs.content: The LORD shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord shall increase you more and more, you and your children.

paragraphs.content: Ye are blessed of the LORD which made heaven and earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye are blessed of the Lord which made heaven and earth.

paragraphs.content: The heaven, even the heavens, are the LORD’s: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The heaven, even the heavens, are the Lord’s: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.

paragraphs.content: The dead praise not the LORD, neither any that go down into silence.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The dead praise not the Lord, neither any that go down into silence.

paragraphs.content: But we will bless the LORD from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But we will bless the Lord from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the Lord.
